title: The Fiscal Cliff: Legislative Malpractice
content:
The so-called fiscal cliff, dramatic as it is, is nonetheless the end result of the refusal by Congress to approve a... <!--more--> budget for the last three years.
Leid Stories makes the case that this is not mere political dealings; itâ€™s legislative malpractice, and ought to carry a penalty in much the same way that any other professional found derelict in his/her duties to a client.
Listeners chime in with their points of view.
